he3.name: Mermaid Editor
he3.description:
Mermaid Editor Tool Documentation

Mermaid Editor is an online Mermaid chart editor that helps users quickly create various types of Mermaid charts. This tool supports multiple types of Mermaid charts, including flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, entity relationship diagrams, Gantt charts, journey maps, Git graphs, and pie charts. Users can create charts by entering Mermaid code or using preset example code, and can preview and download the generated charts in real time.

Use cases:

1. Online editing of Mermaid charts: Users can use the Mermaid Editor tool to edit various types of Mermaid charts online without installing any software.

2. Quickly create Mermaid charts: Mermaid Editor tool provides multiple types of example code, and users can directly use these example codes to create charts without manually writing code.

3. Real-time preview and download of charts: Users can preview the generated charts in real time and download the generated SVG format charts.

Function description:

1. Support multiple types of Mermaid charts: Mermaid Editor tool supports multiple types of Mermaid charts, including flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, entity relationship diagrams, Gantt charts, journey maps, Git graphs, and pie charts.

2. Support input of Mermaid code: Users can manually enter Mermaid code to create charts.

3. Support preset example code: Mermaid Editor tool provides multiple types of example code, and users can directly use these example codes to create charts.

4. Real-time preview of charts: Users can preview the generated charts in real time.

5. Support downloading charts: Users can download the generated SVG format charts.

6. Support automatic synchronization: Users can choose the automatic synchronization function. When the input Mermaid code changes, the tool will automatically regenerate the chart.

7. Support multiple languages: Mermaid Editor tool supports multiple languages, and users can choose their familiar language to use the tool.

Instructions:

1. Open the Mermaid Editor tool.

2. Enter Mermaid code in the input box or select preset example code.

3. Click the "Generate" button, and the tool will automatically generate the chart.

4. View the generated chart in the preview area.

5. If you need to download the chart, you can click the "Download" button.

6. If you need automatic synchronization function, you can turn on the "Automatic Synchronization" switch.

7. If you need to switch languages, you can select your familiar language in the language selection box.

Notes:

1. Mermaid Editor tool needs to be used online.

2. The Mermaid code format supported by Mermaid Editor tool is limited, and users need to write code according to the specified format.

3. The charts generated by Mermaid Editor tool may have display problems due to browser compatibility and other reasons, and users need to adjust according to the actual situation.

4. The example code provided by Mermaid Editor tool is for reference only, and users need to modify it according to actual needs.
